center_location_type.description: 1 => On Institute Premises, 2 => On Branch Premises, 3 => On Training Center Premises

trainingCentersWithBatches.description: Training Center with active OR/AND upcoming batches

religion.description: '1 => Islam, 2 => Hinduism, 3 => Christianity, 4 => Buddhism, 5 => Judaism, 6 => Sikhism, 7 => Ethnic, 8 => Agnostic/Atheist

freedom_fighter_status.description: 1 => No, 2 => Yes, 3=> child of a freedom fighter, 4 => grand child of a freedom fighter
